des:
Transform your bathing and relaxation experience with the Sinapse Home skill for Alexa. With this skill, you can easily control your bathtub, spa, and pool using simple voice commands. Turn the motors on and off, adjust the heating temperature, and control the chromotherapy, all with the power of your voice.

To start using the Sinapse Home skill, follow the steps below:

1 - Download the Sinapse Home app from the App Store or Google Play Store.

2 - Log in or create an account.

3 - Activate pairing on your Sinapse controller or heater and add it to the app.

4 - Change the device names if necessary. The device names in the app will be the same invocation names on Alexa.

5 - Go to the Alexa app and enable the Sinapse Home skill.

6 - Log in to the skill with the same account created in the Sinapse Home app.

7 - After linking, ask Alexa to discover new devices.

8 - Done! You can now use voice commands.

Here are the voice commands you can use:

To turn on and off the motors:
"Alexa, turn on hydro 1"
"Alexa, turn off hydro 1"
"Alexa, turn on hydro 2"
"Alexa, turn off hydro 2"
"Alexa, turn on hydro 3"
"Alexa, turn off hydro 3"
"Alexa, turn on waterfall"
"Alexa, turn off waterfall"
"Alexa, turn on blower"
"Alexa, turn off blower"
"Alexa, turn on filter"
"Alexa, turn off filter"
"Alexa, turn on auxiliary"
"Alexa, turn off auxiliary"
"Alexa, turn on filling"
"Alexa, turn off filling"

To adjust the heating temperature and control the mini fridge:
"Alexa, set heater to 35 degrees"
"Alexa, what is the temperature of the heater?"
"Alexa, set mini fridge to 0 degrees"
"Alexa, what is the temperature of the mini fridge?"

To control the chromotherapy:
"Alexa, turn on chromotherapy"
"Alexa, set chromotherapy to blue"
"Alexa, set brightness of chromotherapy to 50%"

Enjoy the convenience of controlling all these elements with the ease and practicality of voice commands. Create a personalized experience by adjusting every detail to suit your taste and needs, all without having to leave the water or use physical controls.

Activate the Sinapse Home skill today and discover a new way to enjoy your relaxation space. Transform your bathtub, spa, and pool into a luxurious voice-controlled sanctuary. Relax, enjoy, and indulge in a perfect environment, all with the power of your voice.

Please note that the Sinapse Home skill is only compatible with Sinapse heaters and controllers that have Sinapse Home technology. If you have any questions or need assistance, do not hesitate to contact us at : contato@sinapse.ind.br.
